accountability_scores.actor_label: Inspeccion de Trabajo y Seguridad Social

personal_accountability_methodology.score_formula: sum(irlc_score * role_weight * edge_confidence * primary_evidence_factor), normalized 0-100 by max person
personal_accountability_methodology.ranking_note: top_person_scores is a display cap (top_n); gate checks always use full persons_scored_total
personal_accountability_methodology.identity_resolution_method: exact normalized full_name match OR alias match on person_name_aliases.canonical_alias
personal_accountability_methodology.identity_provenance_note: alias source quality is tracked via source_kind (manual_seed vs official_*) and source_record_pk coverage for official aliases.

methodology.score_formula: sum(irlc_score * role_weight * edge_confidence * primary_evidence_factor), normalized 0-100 by max person
methodology.ranking_note: top_person_scores is a display cap (top_n); gate checks always use full persons_scored_total
methodology.identity_resolution_method: exact normalized full_name match OR alias match on person_name_aliases.canonical_alias
methodology.identity_provenance_note: alias source quality is tracked via source_kind (manual_seed vs official_*) and source_record_pk coverage for official aliases.
